HI THERE!

I'm a amateur developer currently living in Lahti, Finland and studying at LAMK.

The idead of having a website to write stuff, to show off some projects you have been working on is kind of cool, so why don't I give it a try?

This site is built with Jekyll and hosted on Amazon S3. Images are provided mostly by UnSplash, 'cause taking good photos isn't my strengh.
